meta.title: AI Agent Story Point Reference Guide

summary: This guide provides standardized story point estimation for AI agents operating at accelerated speeds. Story points represent complexity and effort, not time duration. Sprints complete when committed story points are delivered.

sections.title: Overview

**Examples**:

- Fix typo in documentation

- Update environment...

Technical Complexity.content_preview:
- **Low**: Standard CRUD operations, simple UI components
- **Medium**: Business logic, integrations, moderate algorithms
- **High**: Complex algorith...

Integration Points.content_preview:
- **None (0)**: Self-contained work
- **Few (1-2)**: Simple API calls, database interactions
- **Many (3+)**: Multiple service dependencies, complex d...

Testing Requirements.content_preview:
- **Basic (+0)**: Unit tests only
- **Moderate (+1)**: Integration tests required
- **Extensive (+2)**: E2E, performance, security testing

Unknown/Risk Factors.content_preview:
- **Low Risk (+0)**: Well-understood requirements
- **Medium Risk (+1)**: Some unknowns, research needed
- **High Risk (+2)**: Significant unknowns, p...

Documentation Needs.content_preview:
- **Minimal (+0)**: Code comments only
- **Standard (+1)**: API docs, README updates
- **Extensive (+2)**: User guides, architecture docs
